commit.message:
omp-offload.c: translation fixes (PR translation/80001)

gcc/ChangeLog:
	PR translation/80001
	* omp-offload.c (oacc_loop_fixed_partitions): Make diagnostics
	more amenable to translation.
	(oacc_loop_auto_partitions): Likewise.

From-SVN: r246326

files.patch:

+
+	PR translation/80001
+	* omp-offload.c (oacc_loop_fixed_partitions): Make diagnostics
+	more amenable to translation.
+	(oacc_loop_auto_partitions): Likewise.
